DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine benefit physical activity breast cancer survivor related muscle strength , tiredness , sleep quality . Also , study determine potential role inflammation benefit .
DOC.detailed_description: Our previous research show increase physical activity improve health well-being breast cancer survivor . The current study determine whether physical activity increase adequate improve health measure physical activity ( accelerometer self-report ) , muscle strength , fatigue , sleep . Moreover , study examine cytokine change cancer survivor participation physical activity behavior change intervention mechanistic focus cytokine may influence muscle strength , fatigue , sleep response intervention . Seventy-four female , breast cancer survivor recruit within 50-miles radius Springfield , IL . Participants study approximately 5 month . Participants ask complete questionnaire begin study 3 month later . A blood sample drawn determine serum cytokine level . Volunteers randomly assign 1 2 study group . The intervention group participate 3 month physical activity intervention involve moderate intensity walk strength training resistance band . This randomize controlled trial include follow study aim : Study aim 1 : The intervention group compare control group examine change physical activity , muscle strength , fatigue , sleep dysfunction participation physical activity intervention . Study aim 2 : To investigate mechanism may underlie effect physical activity intervention muscle strength , fatigue , sleep , compare intervention group control group term change cytokine marker inflammation evaluate whether change consistent may mediate change muscle strength , fatigue , sleep dysfunction .
DOC.criteria: Female , 30 70 year age , first diagnosis ductal carcinoma situ ( DCIS ) Stage I Stage II breast cancer If chemotherapy radiation therapy receive , patient must least 4 week status post final primary treatment administration allow treatment relate cytokine change resolve . The participant may take long term therapy aromatase inhibitor , estrogen receptor modulators , etc . If patient undergone surgical procedure , must least 8 week postprocedure . English speak Medical clearance participation provide primary care physician oncologist Postmenopausal Average fatigue past week ≥ 3 1 10 Likert scale sleep dysfunction ≥ 1 0 3 Likert scale Participating , average , 20 minute physical activity two few day per week past six month Willing abstain `` need '' medication 7 day prior blood draw . `` As need '' medication define medicine ( prescription overthecounter ) take sporadically need specific complaint rather take regularly schedule interval ( e.g. , daily ) . Metastatic recurrent breast cancer Inability ambulate without assistance Unstable angina New York Heart Association class II , III , IV congestive heart failure Uncontrolled asthma Interstitial lung disease Current use steroid Having tell physician exercise prescribe physician Dementia organic brain syndrome Schizophrenia active psychosis Connective tissue rheumatologic disease [ i.e. , Systemic lupus erythematosus , rheumatoid arthritis , amyloidosis , Reiter 's syndrome , psoriatic arthritis , mixed connective tissue disease , Sjögren 's syndrome , progressive systemic sclerosis , CREST syndrome , polymyositis , dermatomyositis , vasculitis , polymyalgia rheumatic , temporal arteritis ] Anticipates undergo elective surgery duration intervention would interfere intervention participation ( e.g. , breast reconstructive surgery ) .
